ygData.subject: Re: Bard vs Wizard race?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If that s true, lava is no where near as bad. One afternoon several bored friends and I took some time off killing kobolds in Sol B to hold a high diving
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 04/99, kim@... wrote:
> From: kim@...
>
> Yup. IIRC, you lose 1/6th of your hp for every tick you're
> drowning. It's independent of how many hp you have.
>
> Wait'll you fall into lava. :-)
>

If that's true, lava is no where near as bad. One afternoon several
bored friends and I took some time off killing kobolds in Sol B to hold
a high diving contest off the ledge opposite the Sol B entrance ( I
think it's the entrance to the new quest zone they are putting in)

With a running leap out of there you can get a great jump into the lava
pool. We got some great screenshots. The dwarf is especially funny
because when they do a running jump their animation makes them do a
summersault. With my slightly pumped up fire resist (BI Crown, Fork)
I was taking maybe 22 hp damage and if I sang chant of cooling I took
about 16.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
